mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CTPV_NM /* 시도명 */ , RPB_LOCARA_CD /* 책임지역코드 */ FROM TB_SVPD_RPB_LOCARA_MNGT_ADR_IZ T2 /* 책임지역관리주소내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND ADR_ODR_NO = ( SELECT MAX(ADR_ODR_NO) FROM TB_SVPD_RPB_LOCARA_MNGT_ADR_IZ TT1 WHERE TT1.FR2P_LGLD_CD = T2.FR2P_LGLD_CD AND TT1.CTPV_NM = T2.CTPV_NM AND TT1.CTCTY_NM = T2.CTCTY_NM AND TT1.LAWC_EMD_NM = T2.LAWC_EMD_NM AND TT1.AMTD_NM = T2.AMTD_NM AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TT1.APY_STRTDT AND TT1.APY_ENDDT ) UNION ALL SELECT CTPV_NM /* 시도명 */ , LPAD(MAX(RPB_LOCARA_CD), 3, '0') AS RPB_LOCARA_CD /* 책임지역코드 */ FROM TB_SVPD_RPB_LOCARA_MNGT_ADR_IZ T2 /* 책임지역관리주소내역 */ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND ADR_ODR_NO = ( SELECT MAX(ADR_ODR_NO) FROM TB_SVPD_RPB_LOCARA_MNGT_ADR_IZ TT1 WHERE TT1.FR2P_LGLD_CD = T2.FR2P_LGLD_CD AND TT1.CTPV_NM = T2.CTPV_NM AND TT1.CTCTY_NM = T2.CTCTY_NM AND TT1.LAWC_EMD_NM = T2.LAWC_EMD_NM AND TT1.AMTD_NM = T2.AMTD_NM AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TT1.APY_STRTDT AND TT1.APY_ENDDT ) GROUP BY CTPV_NM ) ORDER BY RPB_LOCARA_CD
